lead_paragraph: Some 135,000 buyers of the 2016 Traverse, Enclave or Acadia could receive cash or extended warranties.

headline.print_headline: G.M. to Compensate 135,000 Owners of S.U.V.s That Overstate Mileage
headline.main: G.M. to Compensate Owners of S.U.V.s That Overstate Mileage

snippet: Some 135,000 buyers of the 2016 Traverse, Enclave or Acadia could receive cash or extended warranties.
abstract: General Motors says it will give cash or extended warranties to 135,000 owners of certain large sport utility vehicles with window stickers exaggerating likely gas mileage; move reflects building scrutiny carmakers are receiving in wake of Volkswagen diesel emission scandal.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
